quest.name: Rings of Pattern
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol wants to bring a touch of style to some otherwise drab textiles.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid purple pigment in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid purple pigment to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid turmeric in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid turmeric to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid spiralshell in south Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid spiralshell to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: We Qitari are experts at weaving clothes, bags, and so on, which we decorate in the traditional manner using various colors.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: But with so many of us preoccupied with excavating the caves, we've had little time to gather the raw ingredients for producing the dyes we need.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a small quantity of purple pigment, I think a reward of some sort would be in order.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a small quantity of turmeric, I think a reward of some sort would be in order.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a spiralshell, I think a reward of some sort would be in order. And were said volunteer to use fruit worms as bait, I'm sure they'd snag one in a jiffy!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Blind Forest of Yx'Maja would be an excellent place to begin your search, but watch out for beasties, especially those tarichuks. Oh, I can't stand them!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Blind Forest of Yx'Maja would be an excellent place to begin your search, but watch out for beasties, especially those tarichuks. Oh, I can't stand them!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The southern part of Mjrl's Regret is where you're most likely to find one, but don't let those caracals catch you by surprise!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Do you have something for me, by any chance? I'm dye-ing to see it! <snort>

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: With this, we'll be able to bring a touch of Ronkan elegance to our textiles. The patterns with which we adorn ourselves come from their ancient culture, you see.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Those that feature a pair of straight, parallel lines represent harmony, whereas spirals are a symbol of the never-ending cycle of nature, for example.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Perhaps you would consider wearing some of our traditional garments yourself? I think you'd look rather fetching in one of our hats!
